name: Project Pico - WIP
description:
Controls :
Keyboard :
- WASD : Move
- Space (hold) : Shoot
- Mouse : Aim
- Shift : Bomb
- Right Click: Roar (4s cooldown)

Controller:
- Left Stick/dpad : Move
- R1 (hold) : Shoot
- Right Stick : Aim
- L1 : Bomb
- L2 : Roar (4s cooldown)

Bug : If you fullscreen on Itch you'll have to refresh the page to play in non-fullscreen

I aim to make this a complete game in 8 days over weekends and stream the process.
The goal is half to have fun and half to train myself in scoping and picking the low hanging fruits instead of trying to get lost in system polish that don't build up to a complete and fun game.

Let me know in the comments if you have suggestions to consider or vote on the Twitter polls I'll host at https://twitter.com/Scruffy_Brush
